word: He [Judas] . . . did not become transformed, and converted into a living branch through connection with the True Vine. This dry sapling adhered not to the Vine until it grew into a fruitful, living branch. He revealed that he was the graft that did not bear fruit,-- the graft that did not, fiber by fiber and vein by vein, become knit with the Vine, and partake of its life.
